Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Cooking/Food | Family | Lifestyle
Status: TBD/On The Bubble
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 07:30 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: February 29, 2012
Episode Order: 4

Food Inspectors is presented by Chris Hollins and Matt Allwright. They take a look at the work of food inspectors as they protect the country from rogue restaurants and poisonous food.
